subsystem {
  name: "standard_zygote"
  zygote {
    name: "standard_zygote"
    executable: "${runfiles_dir}/__main__/stagezero/zygote/standard_zygote"
    stdin {
      where: STAGEZERO
    }
    stdout {
      where: STAGEZERO
    }
    stderr {
      where: STAGEZERO
    }
  }
 

}

autostart: "standard_zygote"
